page.title: 05Roehampton (2) The Estates
page.content: After World War 2 an area known as Alton East, which lies S.W. of Roehampton Lane, was developed by the London County Council. 3/5 Alton East homes are in ten eleven-storey point blocks. Heathmere Primary School and a small shopping parade serve this area where the contour of the land and many original trees were preserved.Danebury Avenue runs through the estate called Alton West. When it was built in the late fifties it was a prize-winning estate,one of the first to group build- ings of different heights and sizes on one estate.Alton West extends along the edge of Richmond Park and was built on 60 acres out of the 100 acres of the grounds of Mount Clare,Downshire House and Manresa House. It is world famous for the design of its apartment blocks occupying the sweep of the specially landscaped Downshire Field.(cont.over)
